issue.title: discord.com

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions
performed_via_github_app.description: Automate your workflow from idea to production

issue.title: gimy.ai
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://gimy.ai/eps/207873-7-119.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgimy.ai%2Feps%2F207873-7-119.html) ### Comment > Since I use AdGuard. There never been any problem blocking any of the ads in any website including this website. However recently there is error while updating the AdGuard. Since then the ads starting to appear in certain website. This is just one of them. > > I had sent the feedback regarding failed during AdGuard update too Username: `kssim2001@gmail.com` ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/isw1zvdhy60wgs84gww8cggo8sk00k4i53g8qh1wi0.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.8 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://family.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
